text: Fernanda Constanza Hidalgo Rubilar (born 4 May 1998) is a Chilean footballer who plays as a midfielder for Colo-Colo and the Chile women's national team. ==International career== Hidalgo made her senior debut for Chile on 1 September 2019 in a 0–0 friendly draw against Brazil (won by Chile through the penalty shoot-out). == References == Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Chilean women's footballers Category:Sportspeople from Santiago Category:Chile women's international footballers Category:Colo-Colo (women) footballers
title: Fernanda Hidalgo
